TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TFImportGraphDefOptions extends TensorFlow.TFDisposable

Docs.summary: Contains options that are used to control how graph importing works.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
.method public hidebysig instance void AddControlDependency(class TensorFlow.TFOperation operation) cil managed

Docs.param: This operation should exist in the graph being imported to.
Docs.summary: Cause the imported graph to have a control dependency on the provided operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddInputMapping (string srcName, int srcIndex, TensorFlow.TFOutput dst);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddInputMapping(string srcName, int32 srcIndex, valuetype TensorFlow.TFOutput dst) cil managed

Docs.summary: Adds an input mapping from a source name and index to a destination output
Docs.remarks: Set any imported nodes with input `src_name:src_index` to have that input replaced with `dst`. `src_name` refers to a node in the graph to be imported, `dst` references a node already existing in the graph being imported into.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddReturnOutput (string operName, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void AddReturnOutput(string operName, int32 index) cil managed

Docs.summary: Add an output in the graph definition to be returned via the return outputs parameter.
Docs.remarks: If the output is remapped via an input mapping, the corresponding existing tensor in graph will be returned.

Docs.summary: Gets the number return outputs added via AddReturnOutput.

MemberSignature.Value: public void RemapControlDependency (string srcName, TensorFlow.TFOperation destination);
.method public hidebysig instance void RemapControlDependency(string srcName, class TensorFlow.TFOperation destination) cil managed

Docs.param: Node in the graph to be imported.
References an operation that already exists in the graph being imported.
Docs.summary: Sets any imported nodes with a given control input to have it replaced with an operation
Docs.remarks: Set any imported nodes with control input to have that input replaced with .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SetPrefix(string prefix) cil managed
